package.name: Services_Amazon_S3
package.summary: PHP interface to Amazon S3's API
package.description:
Services_Amazon_S3 is a PHP library for accessing Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3). The library is based on the 2006-03-01 REST API.
Features: * list, create and delete buckets, including buckets with location constraints (European buckets) * create, read and delete objects including metadata * list keys in a bucket using an SPL Iterator with support for paging, key prefixes and delimiters * manipulate access control lists for buckets and objects * specify the request style (virtualhost, cname, path style) and endpoint * get signed URLs to allow a trusted third party to access private files * access buckets and objects using PHP filesystem functions through a stream wrapper
package.notes: * Fix Bug #15732: Files get truncated when mbstring overloading is enabled * Fix Bug #15312: Warning in getSignedUrl() * Fix missing require_once of ServerErrorException.php * Make getSignedUrl() available for buckets as well * Stream wrapper option "default_acl" renamed to "acl" ("default_acl" is also supported in this release for backwards compatibility - bug #15893) * Implement Request #15240: Add ability to set content headers for new objects created via streams * Preserve ACL in rename() and actually delete the source, i.e. move not copy * Make Services_Amazon_S3_Resource_Bucket::getURL() throw exception if bucket name is valid for current request style
